Date: 2024-10-29 14:13
Subject: A New Chapter For Tanagra, Calling All Our Runners, The Fashion Lab Goes Social, Humanitarian Support For Lebanon, Nominate Now, Internal Job Opportunities, Michael Kors Mid-Season Sale, Jimmy Choo at Hia Hub & Acceptable Use Policy
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/peVhkeZEDkK_ygJCLIE0lg/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/peVhkeZEDkK_ygJCLIE0lg/550575/93432231C5414F9BB4CF5F5770E0811F/chalhoub-sports-day-10.gif> 	

A NEW CHAPTER FOR TANAGRA


Approaching their 45th anniversary, Tanagra unveils a refreshed identity that honors its heritage and embraces the future. This new look reflects their commitment to exquisite craftsmanship, Middle Eastern hospitality, and the art of living.

The first phase of the “If Tanagra” campaign brings the refined identity to life, celebrating Tanagra’s legacy and timeless charm. The campaign captures the spirit of Tanagra through authentic stories from those closest to the brand—our team members, clients, and friends.

Discover more <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fwww.instagram.com%252ftanagra%252f%253fhl%253den%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWSFr0pfg4eiwmcOS87CVnlcb6fPjcD8qAeVf54xm72zvWz7SBWtYeuKD3jJga8mVCZ2FINCB3LPveYw1NuCwjuU%252fNo%252fJfT3wC8FF4YUN3n0mOVCyeiZaVTO9PRZq8yECOCyi5ZT5CW1sYBq3lhw035xAqctNj6mgr6XrB52xmlbPCBanhysFidJEG7ytiINZVec8UJXRpb0XLUTGwROrhhAo6yPzGNV%252bgAxMCwwJbVM7&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ca4bcbc35ef614c5857d908dcf80247c9%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638657935921024753%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=X3Rl1gi%2FGepEpUqJ7hfRhy4O3JXsa37U59EwB1X31Dw%3D&reserved=0>

CALLING ALL OUR RUNNERS

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/peVhkeZEDkK_ygJCLIE0lg/550570/10DE86E8335DF671F6A8E948745C0473/image-2024-10-29t111510-104.jpeg> 	
Registration for Dubai Marathon 2025 on January 12th is now open!

We are sponsoring your participation in the 2025 Dubai Marathon to support your journey towards health and overall wellbeing!

- 42k marathon: Registration fees are fully paid by the Group.
- 10km Road Race: Registration fees are fully paid for the first 150 applicants.
- 4km fun Run: Registrations fees are half paid by the Group.

Kindly keep in mind that the No-Show fee will be borne by the applicant, not the Group. SIGN UP HERE <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fform.jotform.com%252f242961176035457%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWSFr0pfg4eiwmcOS87CVnlcb6fPjcD8qAeVf54xm72zvWz7SBWtYeuKD3jJga8mVCZ2FINCB3LPveYw1NuCwjuU%252fNo%252fJfT3wC8FF4YUN3n0mOVCyeiZaVTO9PRZq8yECOCyi5ZT5CW1sYBq3lhw035xAqctNj6mgr6XrB52xmlbPCBanhysFidJEG7ytiINZVec8UJXRpb0XLUTGwROrhhAo6yPzGNV%252bgAxMCwwJbVM7&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ca4bcbc35ef614c5857d908dcf80247c9%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638657935921063316%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=C3yKaV1dqEgFOzIIxzENMXOudLOft0EFwd7LgWYjQwo%3D&reserved=0>  - Deadline of Registration is 12th of December.

For any inquiries, reach out to rahaf.alrashidi@chalhoub.com <mailto:rahaf.alrashidi@chalhoub.com> .

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/peVhkeZEDkK_ygJCLIE0lg/544518/EA5451AEC8C1A8A08E231DEEFE8086E5/nuggets-10.png> 	

THE FASHION LAB GOES SOCIAL!

TheFashionLab now has its own Instagram and TikTok accounts! Follow along for all things fashion in Saudi Arabia, including exclusive content capturing this year’s Cohort 2 batch of Fashion Founders. Don’t miss out – join us on social media to keep up with our journey! 
Instagram: @TheFashionLab.sa
TikTok: @TheFashionLab.sa

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/peVhkeZEDkK_ygJCLIE0lg/550571/96D7D2020CBBD429B2939CB1C66F3347/tfl_internal-comms-1.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/peVhkeZEDkK_ygJCLIE0lg/544573/34D6D3FF3AF7F1407E60184C44D22490/nuggets-13.png> 	

HUMANITARIAN SUPPORT FOR LEBANON

As a Group, we have partnered with Emirates Red Crescent to support the people of Lebanon, through humanitarian aid.

For in-kind donations, items can be dropped off in HO1, HO2 and D3 receptions.

Let us continue creating impact together during these difficult times.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/peVhkeZEDkK_ygJCLIE0lg/550572/415FAE29AF052F68508A259128FF33DB/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-30.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/peVhkeZEDkK_ygJCLIE0lg/549433/3313A052F911679EB07CAA448C355A00/untitled-design-55.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/peVhkeZEDkK_ygJCLIE0lg/550525/3AF3B0965BF3029B5782FDA1214A75F7/banner-43.png>

NOMINATIONS ARE NOW OPEN


It is time to recognise your successes and the contributions that made a difference. We encourage everyone to participate and highlight the great work happening within our teams.

NOMINATE NOW <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fapps.powerapps.com%252fplay%252fe%252fdefault-6ef8304c-f37b-42a5-a569-0a7d8249fbf3%252fa%252f2a49513b-04fb-4734-858a-bfc9504d7b4f%253ftenantId%253d6ef8304c-f37b-42a5-a569-0a7d8249fbf3%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWSFr0pfg4eiwmcOS87CVnlcb6fPjcD8qAeVf54xm72zvWz7SBWtYeuKD3jJga8mVCZ2FINCB3LPveYw1NuCwjuU%252fNo%252fJfT3wC8FF4YUN3n0mOVCyeiZaVTO9PRZq8yECOCyi5ZT5CW1sYBq3lhw035xAqctNj6mgr6XrB52xmlbPCBanhysFidJEG7ytiINZVec8UJXRpb0XLUTGwROrhhAo6yPzGNV%252bgAxMCwwJbVM7&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ca4bcbc35ef614c5857d908dcf80247c9%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638657935921091323%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=4Zc4ZE7swTUi%2FnwHRN7flqVua8ZP9P9gJu1xwAoyd6w%3D&reserved=0>

LAST CHANCE ON THE MICHAEL KORS MID-SEASON SALE

Don’t miss out on the 30% - 50% Mid Season Sale at MK.

All Chalhoub Group team members can now enjoy an exclusive 50% off on all sale items from now until the 3rd of November! 

Happy shopping!

 

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/peVhkeZEDkK_ygJCLIE0lg/550574/B925994540E0FF1CA709A1CC66676C78/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-31.gif>

JIMMY CHOO AT THE HIA HUB

Jimmy Choo invites you to a Gallery Exhibition featuring the work of Zahrah Alghamdi.

Date: 30th October until 3rd November

Location: HIA HUB, Jax District

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/peVhkeZEDkK_ygJCLIE0lg/550573/E70E487CEDB8F6C669908FB44E2C141E/autumn-24_primary_scarlett-50-cinch-m-ruby-red_1x1.jpg>

SIGN OUR MANDATORY ACCEPTABLE USE POLICY

As we continue to grow and strengthen our online and offline presence, we are aware that cyber threats are more prevalent than ever.

We count on you to protect the Group’s information!
